description:
* Based on shoujo manga series by http://anidb.net/cr22000 [Ayahana Min], serialised by http://anidb.net/cr780 [Shueisha] in http://anidb.net/cr22563 [Ribon].
Akazukin Chacha is the story of a young witch, http://anidb.net/ch17733 [ChaCha], who lives with her master http://anidb.net/ch9879 [Seravi] on Mt. Mochimochi. She is young and impressionable, but not the brightest of students (her magic never seems to work quite right).
